summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the generation and behavior of HTTP sitemaps under various conditions, such as caching, empty content, localized priorities, custom configurations, multilingual indexing, handling of missing or timezone-aware last-modified dates, ordering of entries, and proper robots directives.
business_intent: Guarantee that sitemap endpoints deliver correct, SEOâ€‘friendly XML, respect caching and localization rules, and comply with web standards, thereby improving site discoverability and search engine indexing.
